titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Jo Ann Davis, a Representative of the Commonwealth of Virginia.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 717.
DEBATE - The House proceeded further with debate on H. Res. 717.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 10/9/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Jo Ann Davis, a former Representative from the Commonwealth of Virginia. Declares that when the House adjourns on October 9, 2007, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Representative Davis.
